sellerCard.oneLiner: Your one time stop for Responsive Website
sellerCard.description:
Hi there! I'm Samantha (Parker) Kelly and I'm Website Developer based in New York, NY. Have been in the field of Web Development for more than 7years, having complete 300+ Projects successfully on different platforms, ensuring they look great, work smoothly, and adapt to different devices. This will be your one-stop shop starting from business plans to Branding, Website Development, and then Marketing.
Come on in, say hello, and chat with us to figure out what's the best possible solution for your business development needs.
I hope you see my ambition and passion through this profile.

description.content:
Greetings 


My name is Samantha, I'll Design Modern and Responsive Wordpress Website that'll Lift your Business to New Heights!


I can build any type of modern web sites, attractive, seo friendly and easy to use. We have developed numerous wordpress websites & ecommerce stores which are being used by hundreds of successful businesses and making high end sales.


You will get; 

  • Customized WordPress website that represent your company
  • Responsive business WordPress website
  • Modern Design
  • 100% secure from malware
  • Quick Delivery
  • compatible on all devices
  • Social media integration
  • Stock Photos
  • Live Chat
  • Backup, cloning, and migration
  • complete eCommerce store
  • Multi-vendor Store
  • Speed Optimization | Live Chat & Social Media Integration
  • Payment gateway integration | Multiple Currency


We Design for:


  • E-Commerce website
  • Corporate or Personal site
  • Portfolio
  • Business
  • Real Estate 
  • Blog
  • Education
  • Health
  • News


What Do We Need From You?


  • Log in for your WordPress admin panel
  • Complete Content/Logo
  • Web Design Reference/Inspiration Site



I'm eager to understand your needs and collaborate to create a site that exceeds your expectations.

slide.name: develop dynamic wordpress ecommerce website store business website checkout page

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can You Redesign my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, If you have a sample site and an outdated website - I will redesign it with a modern design and premium look and feel.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I am confuse or not sure which package suit for my project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No problem. Just drop me a message, I will get back to you ASAP. I will guide you through the whole process.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I am confuse or not sure which package suit for my project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will create a website that looks exactly like the sample websites that you provide me. I can use the original content and images, or I can replace them with your own content and images.

packageList.title: BASIC HOME/LANDING PAGE
packageList.description: Design landing page website + Responsive + Speed Optimization + 30 days free support

packageList.title: SMALL BUSINESS WEBSITE
packageList.description: Modern and Responsive WordPress website design up to 5 pages based on your requirements

packageList.title: RECOMMENDED BUSINESS SITE PACKAGE
packageList.description: 6-10pages ecommerce or business website + Responsive + SEO Optimization + 30 days free support

reviews.comment: I am beyond impressed with Samantha! She fixed my website issue within just few hours, which was faster than I ever expected. Her professionalism, expertise, and clear communication made it stress-free. I'm so grateful for their help and wouldn't hesitate to work with them again. Highly recommended!

Thank once again Samantha 
Second time of working with Samantha and I have no regret, she keep to work and the problem I think is very big was solved not upto 3 hours 

She is a Professional and I will definitely use Samantha again

Samantha is a true professional and a master of their craft. From the initial consultation to the final launch, they were attentive, innovative, and dedicated to bringing my vision to life. Their expertise, creativity, and exceptional communication skills made the entire process seamless and enjoyable. I'm thrilled with the new look of my website, and i highly recommend Samantha.
Very poor communication. Sorry to give low rating, but the project never got completed. Honestly, I suspect this SamanthaPKelly is a front for someone. I hope it works for you but it didn't for me>

Samantha went ABOVE AND BEYOND with her workflawless, detailed, and completely bug-free! Her excellent communication and timely delivery made the entire process seamless. Highly recommend her for any website development needs!
